attributes.action: Government should pay employee wages during corona virus crisis
attributes.additional_details: This would help to remove the anxiety of the nation, stop good businesses from collapse and allow people to isolate with knowledge that they will have an income to pay bills and therefore possibly combating the virus in a shorter time period.
attributes.background: The government should pay the wages of uk employees through the tax system. This is the simplest way to provide security for good businesses and the nation.

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign these petitions calling for the same action:

https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/301652
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/302284

You can find out more about coronavirus and how you can protect yourself and others here:

NHS website: https://www.nhs.uk/conditions/coronavirus-covid-19/

UK Government website: https://www.gov.uk/coronavirus
